subject: fix: post-React-migration cleanup — delete dead code, fix PWA, add a11y
body:
- Delete 17 vanilla JS files no longer used by React (4,200+ lines)
- Rewrite pwa.js: remove ui.js import chain, use custom events
- Clean charts.js: remove filters.js import, keep only pure data fns
- Add ErrorBoundary component wrapping tab content
- Remove unused isDragOver state, escapeHtml usage, parseInlineStyle duplication
- Add getTagStyleObject() to utils.js for React-compatible tag styles
- Fix isMobile to reactively track viewport resize via debounced state
- Add ARIA: tablist/tab roles, dialog/aria-modal on panes, Escape key,
  keyboard support on settings toggles and collapsible sections
- Remove leftover data-* attributes from vanilla JS
- Fix index-based React keys on dynamic lists
- Build: 70 → 57 modules transformed

https://claude.ai/code/session_019r6spa5nEWMTFU4BeyoAwk
title: post-React-migration cleanup — delete dead code, fix PWA, add a11y
